Text: Rob Noonan fundI just spoke with Dan Wayland at TFS He said that a college education fund has been established in Robbys sons name I am sending this message out to all of those people who knew Rob or who have mentioned wanting to contribute to such a fund if it should come about I recognize that all of you may not have known Rob as well as I did Also some of you have been impacted by the loss of many friends in this tragedy and may not be able to contribute to every fund Still I wanted you to be aware of this one Checks should be made payable to The Charles A Noonan Educational Foundation and be sent to The Charles A Noonan Educational Foundation co Craig Polar Lower Cross Road Greenwich CT If you have questions please call Craig Polar at Thank you Kurt
